Name: Add-NetEventNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Adds a network adapter as a filter on a provider.

Name: Add-NetEventPacketCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Adds a Remote Packet Capture provider.

Name: Add-NetEventProvider
Synopsis: Adds an ETW provider to a session.

Name: Add-NetEventVFPProvider
Synopsis: Add-NetEventVFPProvider [-SessionName] <string> [[-Level] <byte>] [[-MatchAnyKeyword] <uint64>] [[-MatchAllKeywords] <uint64>] [[-DestinationMACAddresses] <string[]>] [[-SourceMACAddresses] <string[]>] [[-VLANIds] <uint16[]>] [[-TenantIds] <uint32[]>] [[-GREKeys] <uint32[]>] [[-SourceIPAddresses] <string[]>] [[-DestinationIPAddresses] <string[]>] [[-IPProtocols] <byte[]>] [[-TCPPorts] <uint16[]>] [[-UDPPorts] <uint16[]>] [[-VFPFlowDirection] <uint32>] [[-SwitchName] <string>] [[-PortIds] <uint32[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-NetEventVmNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Adds a virtual network adapter as a filter on the provider.

Name: Add-NetEventVmSwitch
Synopsis: Adds a Hyper-V virtual switch as a filter on a provider.

Name: Add-NetEventVmSwitchProvider
Synopsis: Add-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [-SessionName] <string> [[-Level] <byte>] [[-MatchAnyKeyword] <uint64>] [[-MatchAllKeywords] <uint64>] [[-SwitchName] <string>] [[-PortIds] <uint32[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-NetEventWFPCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Creates a WFP capture provider.

Name: Get-NetEventNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Gets the network adapters associated with a Remote Packet Capture provider.

Name: Get-NetEventPacketCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Displays a Remote Packet Capture provider.

Name: Get-NetEventProvider
Synopsis: Displays the ETW providers that are present on the computer or associated with an event and packet capture session.

Name: Get-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Gets network event sessions.

Name: Get-NetEventVFPProvider
Synopsis:
Get-NetEventVFPProvider [[-SessionName] <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-NetEventVFPProvider [-AssociatedEventSession <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventSession>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-NetEventVmNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Gets virtual network adapters from a provider.

Name: Get-NetEventVmSwitch
Synopsis: Gets Hyper-V virtual switches from a provider.

Name: Get-NetEventVmSwitchProvider
Synopsis:
Get-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [[-SessionName] <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [-AssociatedEventSession <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventSession>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-NetEventWFPCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Displays settings for a local or remote WFP capture provider configuration.

Name: New-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Creates a network event session.

Name: Remove-NetEventNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Removes network adapters associated with a provider.

Name: Remove-NetEventPacketCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Removes the Remote Packet Capture provider and deletes the settings.

Name: Remove-NetEventProvider
Synopsis: Removes an ETW provider from a session.

Name: Remove-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Removes a network event session.

Name: Remove-NetEventVFPProvider
Synopsis:
Remove-NetEventVFPProvider [-SessionName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-NetEventVFPProvider -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventVFPProvider[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-NetEventVmNetworkAdapter
Synopsis: Removes virtual network adapters from a provider.

Name: Remove-NetEventVmSwitch
Synopsis: Removes Hyper-V virtual switches from a provider.

Name: Remove-NetEventVmSwitchProvider
Synopsis:
Remove-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [-SessionName] <string[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-NetEventVmSwitchProvider -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventVmSwitchProvider[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-NetEventWFPCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Removes a local or remote WFP capture provider.

Name: Set-NetEventPacketCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Modifies the configuration for a Remote Packet Capture provider.

Name: Set-NetEventProvider
Synopsis: Modifies settings for an ETW provider.

Name: Set-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Modifies a network event session.

Set-NetEventVFPProvider [[-Level] <byte>] [[-MatchAnyKeyword] <uint64>] [[-MatchAllKeyword] <uint64>] [[-DestinationMACAddresses] <string[]>] [[-SourceMACAddresses] <string[]>] [[-VLANIds] <uint16[]>] [[-TenantIds] <uint32[]>] [[-GREKeys] <uint32[]>] [[-SourceIPAddresses] <string[]>] [[-DestinationIPAddresses] <string[]>] [[-IPProtocols] <byte[]>] [[-TCPPorts] <uint16[]>] [[-UDPPorts] <uint16[]>] [[-VFPFlowDirection] <VFPFlowDirection>] [[-SwitchName] <string>] [[-PortIds] <uint32[]>] -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventVFPProvider[]> [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Synopsis:
Set-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [[-SessionName] <string[]>] [[-Level] <byte>] [[-MatchAnyKeyword] <uint64>] [[-MatchAllKeyword] <uint64>] [[-SwitchName] <string>] [[-PortIds] <uint32[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NetEventVmSwitchProvider [[-Level] <byte>] [[-MatchAnyKeyword] <uint64>] [[-MatchAllKeyword] <uint64>] [[-SwitchName] <string>] [[-PortIds] <uint32[]>] [-AssociatedEventSession <CimInstance#MSFT_NetEventSession>] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-NetEventWFPCaptureProvider
Synopsis: Modifies the configuration of a WFP capture provider.

Name: Start-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Starts event and packet capture for a network event session.

Name: Stop-NetEventSession
Synopsis: Stops event and packet capture for a network event session.
